name: NSPopover.CloseReason
desc: Values that specify the reason for the willCloseNotification notification.

items.name: static let detachToWindow: NSPopover.CloseReason
items.desc: Specifies that the popover has been closed because it is being detached to a window.

items.name: static let standard: NSPopover.CloseReason
items.desc: Specifies that the popover has been closed in a standard way.
